core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Tun indicates successful progress (in its circumstances). To a small extent it will be advantageous to be firm and correct.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Strategic withdrawal. You pull back to preserve strength, authority, and position rather than wasting force in a losing situation. Retreat done with discipline is not cowardice — it’s wisdom. Chasing, clinging, or retreating in panic invites danger. Calm, dignified withdrawal creates long-term advantage.

translations.text: The first SIX, divided, shows its subject retiring tail-wise. There will be peril; he should not (try to) go anywhere.
初六：遯尾，厲，勿用有攸往。

lines.normalized_meaning: You’re late to withdraw and exposed in the open. It’s dangerous. Don’t force movement now — any attempt to act just increases risk.

translations.text: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject holding (the situation) fast, as with a thong of yellow ox-hide, so that no one can loose it.
六二：執之用黃牛之革，莫之勝說。

lines.normalized_meaning: You bind yourself to restraint. You refuse to be provoked or chased back into the fight. Your resolve holds, and cannot be pulled apart.

translations.text: The third NINE, undivided, shows one retiring but bound (to the situation). There is illness and peril; but if he keep (and employ) his servants and concubines, there will be good fortune.
九三：係遯，有疾厲，畜臣妾吉。

lines.normalized_meaning: You’re trying to withdraw but still entangled. Stress and danger are real. The move here is: keep loyal support, manage what’s close, don’t posture grandly. That’s what keeps it favorable.

translations.text: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject retiring in a good way. There will be good fortune for the superior man; but for the small man there will be evil.
九四：好遯，君子吉，小人否。

lines.normalized_meaning: Voluntary retreat. The principled person steps back cleanly and thrives. The petty person can’t let go and therefore suffers.

translations.text: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the excellent retiring. With firm correctness there will be good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: Refined retreat. You withdraw with dignity and moral clarity, not bitterness. Holding that stance brings good fortune.

translations.text: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject retiring grandly. There will be nothing in which there will not be advantage.

lines.normalized_meaning: Master-level withdrawal. You exit with full strength intact, on your own terms. This kind of retreat actually upgrades your long-term position.
